p: Specific surface area and porosity of electrocatalysts were investigated using N 2-sorption analysis (Quantachrome NOVA 4200e multi-station, Quantachrome Instruments, Boynton Beach, FL, USA). Mo 2C/CNT was found to be non-porous with a specific surface area of 182 m 2 g −1. For mesoporous Mo 2C/CXG, an average pore diameter of ca. 18 nm and a specific area of 410 m 2 g −1 were determined.
